## Project Introduction ([‰∏≠Êñá](README.md) | English)

This project aims to help developers quickly build knowledge documents and construct deployable online knowledge documents.

**Main content includes:**

1. **Project Structure Introduction**
2. **Document Syntax Writing**

## Project Significance

To help developers quickly build knowledge documents and construct deployable online knowledge documents.

## Content Outline

- Table of Contents
    - Chapter 1 Document Writing Guide
        - [Section 1 Document Structure](chapter1/structure.md)
        - [Section 2 Writing Syntax](chapter1/grammar.md)
    - Chapter 2 Deploying GitHub Page
        - [Section 1 Deployment](chapter2/grammar.md)



## Directory Structure Explanation

```bash
‚îú‚îÄ code           <--- Code Directory
‚îú‚îÄ data           <--- Data Directory
‚îú‚îÄ docs           <--- Notes Directory
‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ chapter1
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ images   <--- Static Resources
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ xxx.md   <--- markdown notes
‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ chapterX
‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ en          <--- English Notes Directory
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ chapter1
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ images   <--- Static Resources
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ xxx.md   <--- markdown notes
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ chapterX
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ‚îÄ _sidebar.md    <--- Table of Contents Page
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ‚îÄ logo.svg
‚îÇ  ‚îÇ‚îÄ index.html
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ README.md      <--- Homepage
‚îú‚îÄ .gitignore
‚îú‚îÄ README_en.md
‚îî‚îÄ README.md
```

## Contributing

We welcome contributions of all forms, including but not limited to:

- üö® **Bug Reports**: If you find an issue, please submit an [Issue](https://github.com/novasheep/Document/issues)
- üí≠ **Tutorial Suggestions**: Welcome to discuss good ideas in [Discussions](https://github.com/novasheep/Document/discussions)
- üìö **Documentation Improvements**: Help improve documentation content and example code
